episodes.synopsis: An ordinary family man finds the body of a murdered 4-year-old boy and is subsequently shocked that he's at the top of the list of suspects.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Jess becomes Ben's ally when she presents him with compelling evidence that suggests her ex-husband, Paul Murnane, could be the killer.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Ben rushes in to protect Jess when he sees Paul entering her house. After an altercation, the question Ben is left with is, why did Paul return?
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: With Det. Cornielle moving ever closer to charging Ben with murder, he becomes even more desperate to clear his name.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Ben finds a strange man squatting in a vacant house close to where he found Thom -- and then discovers a blood-stained jacket in the home's laundry.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When Eva vanishes, Ben is finally pushed over the edge, revealing a manic and desperate side of himself as searches for his daughter.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies: Episode 6

video.title: Secrets and Lies
video.synopsis: After stumbling upon the remains of a young boy, everyday family man Ben finds his world splitting apart when he becomes the prime murder suspect.
